selections.name: Oui Oui Ma Cherie
selections.reason: Coming off a strong maiden win at Murray Bridge over 1400m. The step up in trip suits and maps well from barrier 3.

selections.name: Damelli
selections.reason: Significant class drop from BM66 to Class 1. Form has been fair in tougher company.

selections.name: Hazy Daze
selections.reason: Last start winner at this distance. Drawn perfectly to get a soft run.

selections.name: Shinohara
selections.reason: Consistent performer who ran a solid 2nd last start. Will be competitive.

danger_horse.name: Damelli
danger_horse.reason: The class drop is the key angle here; if she finds her best form, she wins.

selections.name: Torrita
selections.reason: Ran a very good 2nd at this track and distance last start. The form reference is strong.

selections.name: Ali Foreman
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind Torrita in the same race. Meets her on similar terms.

selections.name: All Too True
selections.reason: Consistent maiden performer with multiple placings. Due for a win.

selections.name: I'm A Hottie
selections.reason: Has shown speed in shorter races. The step up in trip is a query but has talent.

danger_horse.name: Ali Foreman
danger_horse.reason: Closely matched with the top pick on recent form.

selections.name: She Rex
selections.reason: Excellent effort last start in a $50k maiden to finish 3rd. That form is superior to this field.

selections.name: Discreetly Blue
selections.reason: Placed at this track and distance last start. Drawn well to feature again.

selections.name: Minato
selections.reason: Ran a solid 2nd at Gawler last time out. Shows good early speed.

selections.name: Dazelles
selections.reason: Another who placed at the track last start. In the mix for exotics.

danger_horse.name: Discreetly Blue
danger_horse.reason: Proven at the track and distance, will capitalize if the top pick falters.

selections.name: Bocheeva
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track and distance. Beat key rivals and stays in the same grade.

selections.name: Eaglelou
selections.reason: Runner-up last start at Gawler over 1700m. The step up to 2100m looks ideal.

selections.name: Hamner Springs
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind Bocheeva last start. Honest stayer.

selections.name: Flying Assassin
selections.reason: Consistent type who is rarely far away. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Eaglelou
danger_horse.reason: Improving with distance and drawn to get a perfect run.

selections.name: The Tank
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at this track and distance last start. Looks the most reliable in a messy race.

selections.name: Morlaix
selections.reason: Coming off a good 2nd at Strathalbyn. Form is heading the right way.

selections.name: Night Cruiser
selections.reason: Ran 2nd last start. Consistent enough to figure here.

selections.name: Think Tank
selections.reason: Drops back in trip which might suit. Has ability.

danger_horse.name: Morlaix
danger_horse.reason: Recent form suggests a win is close.

selections.name: Tokyo Ice
selections.reason: Won well at this track and distance last start. Maps perfectly from barrier 3 to repeat.

selections.name: Charlesfort
selections.reason: Finished 3rd to Tokyo Ice last time. Meets the winner on slightly better terms.

selections.name: Princess On Palm
selections.reason: Consistent mare who is always around the mark. Good place chance.

selections.name: Vee Rod
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd last start. Wide draw is a slight concern but has ability.

danger_horse.name: Charlesfort
danger_horse.reason: Honest campaigner who will be running on.

selections.name: Lastar
selections.reason: Ran a good 3rd last start. Finds a winnable race here despite the weight.

selections.name: Fashion Dog
selections.reason: Wasn't far away in the same race as Lastar. Competitive.

selections.name: Misludi
selections.reason: Drops significantly in grade from RB66 to RB58. Watch for improvement.

selections.name: Tripod Terror
selections.reason: Fair effort last start. Can fill a minor placing.

danger_horse.name: Misludi
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field if right.
